data.title: The Towering Inferno | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase The Towering Inferno on digital and stream instantly or download offline. A dedication ceremony at the world’s tallest skyscraper turns into a high-rise catastrophe when an electrical flare-up causes a raging fire, trapping some of society’s most prominent citizens on the top floor. This suspense thriller classic features dazzling special effects and a knockout cast, including Paul Newman, Steve McQueen, William Holden, Fred Astaire, Robert Wagner and Faye Dunaway.
data.text:
The special effects are super and once you get used to the idea of a 136-story building in downtown San Francisco, you are ready for anything thrown at you.

June 27, 2023

Nearly 50 years after its release, The Towering Inferno remains one of the golden standards in the disaster thriller genre.

March 2, 2023

This is a loud, bombastic, dumb blockbuster and it just doesn’t thrill audiences in the same way that it would have in 1974. I really question whether it became a sensation purely as a result of hype.

February 7, 2023

Rather than being a reflection of the true terror of a fire, this is a romp of a disaster movie, with some big, fun set pieces, heroes to root for, and villains to boo.

June 23, 2021

The use of real stunts and real fires lend to a staggering visual design with stellar cinematography to match.

August 31, 2020

It starts with flare-ups and explosions, and it ends up in ashes. [Full Review in Spanish]

February 20, 2020

An absolutely spectacular cast, and a top-notch technical team, are the pillars on which 'The Towering Inferno' is based, a film built with the precision of an architect. [Full Review in Spanish]

September 4, 2019

Despite the best efforts of most of those involved, the film never takes off as more than just a remarkable collection of glossy violence.

June 25, 2017
